modifications.instruction: increase the size of the ears by changing the y radius in the first ellipse of the dog's head to 160 and x radius to 200 in the line:  ill [fill color] (0,-64) ellipse [x radius=160, y radius=144];
increase the size of the tongue by changing the x radius in the ellipse of the dog's tongue to 40 in the line:  ill [fill color](0,-192) ellipse [x radius=28, y radius=32];
modifications.result_description: A dog with a larger tongue

modifications.instruction: change the color of the nose to Red500 by replacing BlueGrey900 with Red500 in the line:  ill [BlueGrey900] (56, 0) circle [radius=20];
modifications.result_description: A dog with a red nose

modifications.instruction: delete the code for the tongue in the line:  ill [fill color](0,-192) ellipse [x radius=28, y radius=32];
decrease the size of the body by changing the x radius in the first ellipse of the dog's body to 120 and y radius to 80 in the line:  ill [fill color] (0,-64) ellipse [x radius=160, y radius=144];
modifications.result_description: A dog with a smaller body

modifications.instruction: add a pattern to the ears by adding a foreach loop that draws small circles inside the ears
increase the size of the neck by changing the y coordinate of the second ellipse of the dog's body to 64 in the line:  ill [fill color] (0, 32) ellipse [x radius=128, y radius=112];
modifications.result_description: A dog with a longer neck

modifications.instruction: delete the code for the nose in the line:  ill [BlueGrey900] (56, 0) circle [radius=20];

decrease the size of the legs by changing the x radius in the ellipse of the dog's legs to 20 and y radius to 10 in the line:  ill [fill color] (32,96) .. controls ++( 75:128) and ++(105:128) .. ++(192,  0) .. controls ++(285: 96) and ++(285: 96) .. ++(-80,-32) .. controls ++(105: 64) and ++( 75: 32) .. cycle;
change the shape of the ears to curly by adding a sin or cos function to the first ellipse of the dog's head
